text: 2.8: Jop 4.9; Ais 11.4; Dan 7.10; Hi 10.27; VB 19.15Mba tugar Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi daai guma za kɨrar hɨgɨrga. Nza Bakɨme Zisas won kamthooŋ bɨɨŋbɨɨŋra ana shogirim, ana rimgirga. Nza Bakɨme vhemkora won vhava ŋaara bakɨme phorgɨp kɨrar hɨgɨrga, ana Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi daai guman farfagirga.
